Reviews.Title: So much camera for so little money
Reviews.Author: Harvey
Reviews.Content: BEFORE YOU START READING: This is a pretty comprehensive review of the T3i and some lenses at the end of the review. Be prepared to read a lot, or just skip to the other reviews that say things like "Great camera, takes pretty pictures of babies!" if that is more your style. I have tried to offer an unbiased and comprehensive review of the T3i.The T3i / 600D is such an excellent buy. Let me get this out of the way first though, it only has a few small advantages over the T2i, so if you don't need the things I'm about to list, then save some money and buy the T2i. For me though, I absolutely needed the following:T3i advantages over the T2i*Flip out LCD screen*Digital zoom in video mode*Adjustable Audio levels in video mode*Built in flash control*In camera guide (Ok, I didn't need this feature but it is great for beginning DSLR users)The T2i will still offer the exact same image quality and processing. The only main difference is that the T3i is much better for video as a result of the things listed above. My review will be on the T3i, but if you are only plan on using your Camera for still images, you can save $100 or so with a T2i. I use my camera a lot for video so the T3i was an essential upgrade for me.Ok, now on to the T3i full review! Excellent image quality and potential movie quality HD video (it's all about the lenses). The camera shoots pretty sharp images with the 18-55mm kit lens. It has amazing sharpness and contrast with the 50mm f/1.8 lens that I bought additionally for $107. (Prime lenses, i.e. non zoom lenses will always offer sharper images and perform better in lower light settings due to a wider aperature.) If you are dissatisfied with pictures from this camera, then get a better lens or learn how to use it better. It is definitely NOT the camera itself. The T3i is capable of world class quality images/video if fitted with the proper lens and in the hands of a good photographer.The botton layout and overall camera functionality is a 10/10. I have no complaints at all and everything just makes sense with the location and useability. It has dedicated buttons for almost every fruntion and the menues are quick to access and it is very easy to adjust settings. It has good locations for all of the ports and the battery/memory card slots.The LCD is super bright, detailed and the best in the Canon line at this time. The flip out feature is amazing if you are shooting overhead or have your camera low to the ground. It may help you avoid crawling in the mud for that great shot. It is also nice for self portaits and any other time you won't be directly behind the viewfinder/LCD screen.The quick burst mode allows me to take 8-9 photos in rapid succession, so it is great for action / sports photography. The 18-55mm kit lens that it comes with is great for non professional photographers and offers amazing image quality compared to my old Canon Powershot S5. Eventually if you want to get into more serious photography, you will want to upgrade the kit lens to something better with a lower aperature rating. (aperature essentially means how much light your lens takes in. This has two benefits, it allows you to shoot in darker settings, and allows you to have a faster shutter speed set.)The 1080p HD video can be shot at 24fps or 30fps. It also has standard video recording options as well. The camera has a dedicated video mode selection and can be set to manual mode in the menu for a full customization of settings including shutter speed, aperature, ISO, ect. The video this thing shoots is just stunning. A small note though about the T3i and all other DSLRs on shooting video. When using them for video, there is a max video size that SD memory cards will allow you to use. When shooting in 1080p HD video a typical limit to videos are either around 12 minutes or 4GB, whichever comes first. These are the stats for this camera, but all DSLRs have similar numbers. You can extend the time by shooting in standard definition, but it still has a cap. Most videographers shoot in shorter sequences anyways, so this isn't really an issue. It is just something to take into consideration if you want to do interviews or other long scenes. Again, this goes for all DSLR videography though, and not just the T3i.The build quality is good for what it is; a pro-sumer camera. It doesn't feel cheap by any means. It is a lighterweight DLSR and does not feel as solid as the pro level DSLRs but it costs MUCH less. The T3i still has a solid construction. Though, I would not want to drop it or leave it out in bad weather. I got a Delkin Pro Skin for the T3i, and a battery grip and it feels much more like a pro level camera now and feels better balanced with larger lenses. It is not sealed, dustproof and waterproof like the 7D or the 5D. The 60D has a better build quality and not much more expensive. It is also worth checking out. The 60D is slightly better for stills photography while the T3i is slightly better for shooting videos. You can see a number of reviews and comparisons on youtube.It has great auto settings, though I CERTAINLY recommend learning how to really use your camera and you can take your photography to a whole new level. Having said that, IF you choose to only use the full auto / creative auto settings, you'll have a jaw dropping quality point and shoot camera. Again, I would recommend learning the settings, but for those of you who want great quality photos for birthdays and family get togethers, the T3i will exceed your expectations and is still very easy to use, thanks to the "In Camera Guide." If you really want to use your camera to the best of it's abilities, spend some time reading through the manual, watching how to videos on youtube and read online articles on improving your photography. There are an incredible amount of resources available online for free. spend some time, do the work and it will definitely pay off in the long term.The accessories that come with this package are great for beginners too. I'll eventually be upgrading the tri-pod and the camera bag, but they will certainly be in use for a while until I decide to spend the big bucks on nicer gear. The 16gb card is great, the gear bag is decent quality, the screen protectors were a nice touch and the extra battery is an essential item for any photographer.Overall, the T3i was the perfect camera for my needs. Of course I would love to have a 7D or a 5D, but it is much smarter to spend money on better lenses than to get too hung up on the camera body. Overall, I would recommend the T3i 100%. I am completely satisfied with my purchase, how much I spent, and the value I really recieved from such a great quality camera.Here is an bonus list of lenses worth buying to build your collection. I will provide a list of lenses that are great for the value, and a list of my want but will probably never be able to afford lenses.Great lenses for the value (notice I didn't say cheap, but excellent for the value):Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom The kit lens that comes with this package. (The only reason not to buy this lens if if you are upgrading to a more expensive lens pretty quickly. This is probably THE BEST value lens around, Period. It has good contrast, sharpness, and overall image quality. There is definitely room for improvement, but at the price, this thing is a steal. This lens will suit many peoples needs for a long, long time. For photographers on a budget, this lens is a must have.)Canon EF 50mm f/1.8 II - $110(BEST lens for the value aside from the 18-55mm kit lens)Canon EF 50mm f1.4 USM Standard & Medium Telephoto - $390 (A super great lens for indoor and darker settings. More expensive the than 50mm f/1.8 but if you have the money, this lens is worth the upgrade).Sigma 17-50mm f/2.8 EX DC OS HSM FLD Large Aperture Standard Zoom - $670 (MUCH better than the Canon 18-55mm kit lens. Not cheap, but an excellent substitute for the Canon 17-55 f/2.8 and about $440 cheaper than the canon with only slight differences in image / video quality. Some people even prefer the Sigma. This is a great lens with excellent walk around ranges. This will be my always on lens for probably 90% of the time. This or the Canon 17-55 are a must have for video users).Sigma 30mm f/1.4 EX DC HSM - $400 (Great 30mm prime lens at a decent cost.)Canon EF 85mm f/1.8 USM Medium Telephoto - $400 (Great for macro photography and a decent telephoto distance.)Canon EF 100mm f/2.8 Macro USM - $570 (One of the best lenses for micro/macro photography)Canon EF 70-200mm f/4L USM Telephoto Zoom - $675 (One of the top rated telephoto lenses around and a must for sports photographers.)A lens that isn't quite as good but definitely deserves some attention:Tamron AF 17-50mm F/2.8 XR Di-II LD SP Aspherical (IF) Zoom - $460 (A cheaper alternative to the Canon 17-55 and the Sigma 17-50mm. It is still better than the Canon 18-55mm kit lens. It has great image quality but lacks the Image stabilization that the other two offer (which is essential if you want to use your camera as a handheld often). Tamron offers an IS version of this lens, but tests have shown that it isn't quite as sharp and it is slower than the Sigma and Canon and the autofocus isn't as good. Based on the research I've done online, I'd prefer to buy the Sigma for $50 more than the IS (well Tamron calls it VC) version of this lens.) All that said, this is an excellent lens at a good price if you plan on using a tripod most of the time.Amazing lenses that are expensive list:Tokina 11-16/2.8 AT-X 116 PRO DX - $720 (Best wide angle lens around, in many people's eyes.)Canon EF 24-70mm f/2.8L USM Standard Zoom Lens $1600 (One of the best lenses on the market if not THE best. Great image quality, excellent contrast. The only thing this baby is missing is Image Stabilization.)Canon EF 24-105mm f/4 L IS USM - $1075 (Excellent range, Image stabilization, contrast and picture quality. One of the best lenses after the Canon 24-70mm. For some it may be the best, if they need the IS.)Canon EF-S 17-55mm f/2.8 IS USM - $1100 (Not to be confused with the 18-55mm Canon kit lens. Many people consider this to be THE best lens available for APS-C body cameras, i.e. T2i, T3i, 60D ect. The only downside is that this lens CANNONT be used on full frame cameras. i.e. 5D, 1D.) It is essentially an L quality lens as far as image quality goes. Amazing quality sharpness, contrast, minimal fringing and flaring, and just a fantastic lens. It does lack the L lens quality build though.Final Note: This is not a comprehensive list, nor am I a professional photographer. I am simply a guy who did a ton of research and wanted to contribute and give people a decent place to get started with camera and lens selection. I certainly encourage each of you to do you own research and find out what suits your needs best. You can certainly find cheaper cameras and lenses out there. I take photography pretty serious and want the best quality images/videos possible for a reasonable price. In most cases, you really do get what you pay for. Thanks for reading.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA BUT....... read on.
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I would be a fool to say I don't love this camera. However, do yourself a favor and shop around and make sure you know what you are paying for before you click the "buy" button. STAY AWAY FROM ZEEMO DIGITAL:1. They advertise a NEW CAMERA..... I received a loosely packaged camera and accessories in a brown general box. NOT EVEN A CANON BOX.....2. The Accessories are great if you are using a small point and shoot camera. for a DSlR... FORGET IT! you will never be able to get the quality shot you want with the tripod they deliver. and you will NEVER be able to carry all your goods with the bag they offer.3. The Batteries are NOT (at least in my order) CANON batteries. and drain so fast you will barely get 100 pics per charge.4. The other smaller accessories are not needed for anyone living in the 21st Century. TRUST ME5. ZeeMo attempted to persuade me from waiving my Freedom of Speech rights by telling me they would send me a better bag and tripod if I deleted my negative add off of AMAZON. Because "a negative ad hurts sales so much". I originally did this then, after the difficulty I was having with the battery I decided, TOUGH! The internet needs to be warned.I will say that ZeeMo did send me a Tripod and a Camera bag that they thought was better than the first ones they sent. NOT really. neither tripod stands to wind very well and the bags barely have room for the camera and two lenses.And, they did send me a Canon Battery they say is new. but it wasn't in original packaging (I received it in a small plastic baggie with no packaging at all, for all I know it came from a floor model.So, shop around and trust me stay away from ZeeMo. (oh, ZeeMo DO NOT CONTACT ME WE. OUR BUSINESS IS COMPLETE!)

Reviews.Title: Do Not Order from this Seller or Get the "Accessory Kit"
Reviews.Author: Michael L.
Reviews.Content: I received the shipment promptly.  The camera is terrific and I'm enjoying it.  However, the "Accessory Kit" was seriously lacking - the bag was not the one pictured and was no more than a simple foam rubber bag in which you might store a six pack, there was no memory card or "Jumpstart" DVD, and the other items were cheap (among others, a wipe, some Q-tips and tiny unmarked bottle of what I assume is "cleaning solution").When I wrote to complain about the bag, I received a reply a number of days later that they would send the pictured bag as a "one-time courtesy." A COURTESY?  For delivering the item that was advertised?  I NEVER received a reply about the two missing items.  That was a week ago ... and TODAY I received an e-mail asking for a contact number so that a customer service representative could speak with me.  I replied that I would not give them my contact number, I would not be speaking to a representative, and I expected the three items (the replacement bag, missing memory card, and missing DVD) sent immediately.  I'm not holding my breath.My advice ... SKIP this third-party seller and the completely unnecessary "accessory kit" - order just the camera from AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Do NOT BUY from this seller/cheater
Reviews.Author: shooter007
Reviews.Content: The package arrived on Dec. 19, 2012 as promised. The camera is a fine piece, but I can't enjoy it since no SD card is enclosed in the package. The Seller is a cheater, who did NOT send what they advised in the picture, except for the camera and lens. Yes, they did send the camera bag, which is no better than a plastic shopping bag, and IS NOT the one they showed in the picture.In a summary, the missing items are:1. 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit2. 16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card -3. Secure Digital USB Card Reader -4. Universal Memory Card Wallet -5. Pack of LCD Screen Protectors6. Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR CamerasI hope you read my review before you push the "order" button. It is your money, and it is your choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Keith Sharp "Keith"
Reviews.Content: My son is required to have a DSLR Camera for his HS photo class. We considered the plain vanilla Rebel, but this T3i based on the reviews, seemed worth the additional $150. Then we spotted this 10pc Bundle. What a deal!We love this T3i camera. I'm an avid amateur with a larger Cannon including a few lenses which I was not going to risk for a HS class. This T3i is loaded with features and easier to learn than my larger Cannon.The accessories are pure gravy. I would have had to buy an extra battery and a memory card anyway, so they saved me that dough.The bundled, non-cannon battery seems kinda iffy. It seemed to die quickly during first use. It's supposed to take two hours to charge, but I was back to whatever a full charge yields in probably less than hour. I haven't used it enough to determine it's worth.The 16G memory card works fine.The camera case is nice! Haven't tried the tripod or rest of the stuff yet. But it's the same price with the bundle as without, so it's the best deal I've seen for this camera!

Reviews.Title: I will rate 4 stars because....
Reviews.Author: J.H
Reviews.Content: The camera itself was great. However, the original package including the kit was not exactly the same as advertised on amazon.  The tripod was only 52", and the camera bag was not the same as showing in the picture.  So I contacted the company through emails, and they did apologize and promise to send me the replacements.  So now I received a 57" tripod(they claimed that they ran out of the 59" ) and another camera bag which fits the camera perfectly with the lens on. Anyway, even though it took a while to solve the problems, but they did have good attitude, and I got to keep both bags and tripods.  So I am still giving them 4 stars. If you likes Canon, it is still a good deal, just make sure they have everything as they said before you make a purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: E.H.
Reviews.Content: I probably spent a good 6 months researching DSLR cameras before committing to the Canon Rebel T3i.  First, I was debating between a Nikon or Canon.  After borrowing my friend's Nikon and another friend's Canon and playing around with both for a few months, I decided on getting a Canon and after looking through all my Canon options and price points, I felt like the Rebel T3i was the perfect match for me.The Canon's lighter than Nikon, which I prefer.  I like how the keys/buttons are situated and it feels comfortable on my hands.  I also love how the LCD display screen can be moved around.  Not only does that make it easier to shoot some difficult shots, I also like to swivel the screen around to face the inside of the camera to protect the screen while I'm not using the camera.This kit is also great!  I've used everything in the kit and it's great that I didn't need to go out and buy things separately.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, cheap made bundle items
Reviews.Author: wz
Reviews.Content: The camera takes great point and shoot pictures while offering the option to manually alter functions in the camera to shoot to the photographer's needs.  My wife and I wanted a good camera to take pictures of our son that wouldn't break the piggy bank, and this seemed perfect.  The price seems a little bit too good to be true for the bundle which we found to be hidden in the quality of the extras they send you.  Everything seems to be from 3rd party manufacturers and is cheaply made.  The camera bag is tiny and is somewhat deceptive from what the picture has on Amazon.  The first tripod they sent was broken on arrival and they were kind enough to send us another one.  The second tripod broke at one of the clasps on the leg upon it's first use, they were kind enough to send a third one and notified me it would be the last time.  This one seems to be okay although I'm a bit weary to use it.  Everything they send is made of cheap material.  The SD card is big enough to take a lot of pictures but does not store the data fast enough and pauses when taking multiple action shots.  This was an OKAY buy for the money.  I'm even starting to doubt the camera's durability...Keeping my finger's crossed.  The ONLY things canon brand are the camera, strap, and lens.  Everything else is third party; batteries, tripod, cleaning materials.  The other thing that was deceptive was the instruction manuals.  They don't send you a CD or DVD like they advertise.  They send 2 really thin canon pamphlets with a few tips, that's all.  If I weren't so darn poor and cheap I wouldn't have gone for this a second time knowing the quality of items they sent.  If you're poor and don't have enough to spend on all they send you in the bundle elsewhere, then this might be a good option for you.

Reviews.Title: A Good Kickstart
Reviews.Author: WalpKnight
Reviews.Content: I will not write anything about the Canon T3i/600d or EF-S lens kit.All the same from the reviews and other details from other web-sites. T3i is T3i and really good DSLR camera for beginners and also to pros.So what about the "16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit" which makes this offer than the others.Originally my notes on the accessory kit is not so good.whole parts are in poor quality.Nothing special on tripod . Very weak and your DSLR camera can fall in a good wind.wallet for the SD cards? You won't need it.Spare L8 battery. Use it when you 'really' need it.Hdmi Cable -(this is the nice one but cable is just a cable).Cleaning Kit-Cotton swabsGadget-Not bad , but not big as seen on the picture.there are other options already which can include more attractive offers.On the other hand if you will just shoot indoor and like cheap items you can think this package.But there is always a "But" in this Kit.

Reviews.Title: Amazing find!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Lyons
Reviews.Content: You really can't find a better deal. The bag and tripod were nicer than I expected, and everything works perfectly. The camera is so awesome, and I constantly get compliments on the quality of my photos. The extra battery works great (but doesn't give much warning before it dies - so watch out!) and the memory card has more space than I'll ever need.Mine didn't come with the focus memory stick, but I don't need one anyway, so I'm not concerned.I've had this for about half a year now, and everything is still in perfect condition.I definitely recommend this kit!

Reviews.Title: Seller sent different accessories
Reviews.Author: HermioneOne
Reviews.Content: The kit is not as advertised.  Most accessories don't come from Focus but a cheap, made in China Opteka.  I paid extra $100 to have all the accessories, but it's not worth it.  Will go back to get the camera by itself, from another seller.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: David Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about this package at first because at Best Buy and Target, they were selling this camera for $650 for just the camera. When we received the package, it was everything as advertised. Everything was good quality and has been holding up well for the month I've owned it so far. Can't get a better deal anywhere else for a new D-SLR camera and accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera!  Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Twin Lab Calcium Lactate Purchaser
Reviews.Content: Using the camera is fun. I would recommend this camera because it is an excellent camera. I take it most places I go. Pictures are excellent! It is very user friendly and the camera kit pieces are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: No quarrels here - Nervous at first though.
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah Elam
Reviews.Content: Ok so people make this out to be a "HORROR STORY" but after using these guys this is what I found in truth:The Case - is as depicted (brand - InFocus).Tripod Stand - Works VERY WELL, (if you want a better one that holds up in HIGH Winds, go buy JUST THAT! - sheesh).Batteries - Two, one that IS Canon, and one that isn't, either way both work and you can charge one and use the other.Case for Memory Cards - Great idea and cool little guy.The HDMI Cable - Works, but it's short, (looking for a longer one, you can find them ANYWHERE don't degrade this product because a working one is included).Shipping time to get to Germany for my spouse and I as a Gift I purchased for the both of us to use on our honeymoon was greatThe Camera and lense were in original CANON box and nicely packed, everything worked B-e-a-utifully!!!Memories - Priceless.HIGHLY RECOMENDED and also, HIGHLY RECOMEND that you avoid all negative comments on this product.  Most the complaints are from people that wanted a great deal on a profesional item and thought that the deal wasn't so great.  The cost of the camera alone, is what you get for the camera, the lense, the stand, case, batteries, an HDMI cord, and a case with a memory card and case for not just the one but many.  So if you are seeking a deal, buy it form this company.US Military married to another military member stationed in Germany, and although the box did come in a little abused, all items in the boxes inside the main box did not.~Jeremiah

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Vernonglen "vernonglen"
Reviews.Content: I went from a wonderful Sony point and shoot to the Rebel T3i. As good as the Sony is, and I was very happy with it, this Canon produces a sharper image. The 18 megapixels really do count for something. Combine the flawless lenses with the Megapixels and the photo is incredibly sharp. I paint watercolors, sometimes on location but often indoors basing them on my own photos and being a realist sort of painter I appreciate accurate source material.The Rebel is easy from the get-go. The kit comes with an actual printed instruction book! It also comes with two batteries and charger along with many other items I didn't know I would need. The camera bag is especially useful.Love this camera and the cool stuff included.

Reviews.Title: Nice beginner camera
Reviews.Author: Lovednotspoiled
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Very user friendly. The bundle deal was a good price, and the camera bag is nice. I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Joseph
Reviews.Content: I have not stopped using this camera since I received it. This camera, along the accessories I purchase, has enabled me to take outstanding pictures.  I would highly recommend this camera to anyone. Plus the price was right!

Reviews.Title: Everything as promised
Reviews.Author: david zaremba
Reviews.Content: I received it 2 days early and everything was in the box and packages brand new, I'm extremely happy with everything... Great but!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and OK accessories...
Reviews.Author: David S. Worth
Reviews.Content: I love the camera and am still learning how to operate the more exotic features.  It takes great photos in the point and shoot mode, however.  The kit was OK not the highest quality, but not bad.  The tripod is especially light - a good thing for carrying it, but it will not stand up to regular use.  Overall I am very happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: It was everything I ordered!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Purdy
Reviews.Content: I went to the amazon website and picked this to buy. I got what I bought. What a concept huh?

Reviews.Title: Canon...
Reviews.Author: Pedro Natividad Jr.
Reviews.Content: What can I say... Canon kicks ass! Thoroughly happy and definitely everything I needed and wanted to step up my photo game...

Reviews.Title: Nice Purchase
Reviews.Author: Nehal Bhatt
Reviews.Content: Pretty awesome stuff.... on-time delivery and you never regret with canon... I m not sure if I got the best deal, however I wanted it now and I got it for not-bad price...

Reviews.Title: CHEAP MATERIAL LOW QUALITY
Reviews.Author: Julio E Cordova
Reviews.Content: The camera was made in taiwan and not Japan, secondly the tripod was very low quality and fragil looks like a kids toy, it broke while i was setting up the tripod. Very poor quality not happy with it, i had to return it right away for the high price not worth it . They show in the pictures something diffirent of what they send. They show a strong tripod and its a piece of junk. Stay away from it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package.
Reviews.Author: Amy Tran
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my boyfriend and he loves it. The only thing I've heard him mention is that he wishes the package came with a slightly larger lens.Also, when we opened up the camera bag we noticed that it had white marks all over it. However, it was easily washed off with a damp towel.However, he loves the camera it's a great quality camera and with a price that can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: If It`s Too Good to be True....
Reviews.Author: Mindy
Reviews.Content: For the price I figured this was refurbished.However, I assumed they corrected all mistakes prior to reselling.First Warning;Put in a freshly charged battery and the camera did not turn on.After switching it on and off 2/3 more times; It turned on.I immediately sampled the video recording option, as I wouldmainly be using this feature for shooting website commercials and short films.2nd Warning:When I connected the headset for live audio recording, the screen went black.I wasn`t sure what was wrong, so I disconnected my attachments(mic and head set)The screen came back on. When I reconnected the headset, again the screen went black.(This occurred every time I connected the headset)I turned the camera off and it wouldn`t turn on again.Frustrated at all the issues I had on the first day,  I decided returning it for a refund.I have other cameras, so I`m able to continue my work.Next time I`ll probably just shop at a major retail chain for these types of products;As the return/refund process, in total may take up to two weeks.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: donn
Reviews.Content: This is the second digital Rebel SLR we have had. This camera is a step above the previous Rebel. The picture and video quality are very good, and for rank amateurs they make all photography look professional. Although the camera operation is relatively intuitive, it is worth watching the video a couple of times to maximize the camera's features.

Reviews.Title: Great starter camera
Reviews.Author: Vincenzia
Reviews.Content: This is my first "real" camera. Have been using a cheapo tiny camera for a long time and decided to finally spend some money a a nicer one. This camera takes awesome pictures and it's easy to use. The accessories that come with it are handy but only a few are useful. Some of it's just cheap junker stuff but this is a great set for someone that's just starting out and is cheaper than buying the needed pieces individually.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: The Camera has great picture and it is a good starter kit. The stand broke immediately and is really cheap. I fixed it with duct tape but very annoying and I will have to buy another tripod.

Reviews.Title: Awesome investment!
Reviews.Author: Andrea Zamboras
Reviews.Content: This 10 piece set and camera shipped fast and I love it! Great for a first time Dslr user. The flip screen is awesome and has great visibility. The accessories are outstanding and I'm so glad I got this package. The extra battery has saved me so many times. I didn't have to buy a memory card and the tri-pods are so useful.

Reviews.Title: GREAT ITEM
Reviews.Author: Jose Antonio
Reviews.Content: EVEN  ARRIVED EARLY... GREAT PRODUCT!!!! JUST FOR PEOPLE WHO WANT TO GO FURTHER!!!!! AMPLY RECOMMENDED  JUST READ THE USERS GUIDE VERY CAREFULLY

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Webb
Reviews.Content: I was cautious when ordering an equipment set, as many complained that they did not receive what they ordered. although the components (other than the camera) weren't first-rate, we got what we wanted and have been very satisfied. Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: E
Reviews.Content: My wife has had the camera for a few months now and just absolutely loves it. Everything worked great and was in great condition when it arrived. Shipping was fast. If your looking for a good camera then this is your camera.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Sawyer
Reviews.Content: Love this product, a really great deal. It comes with all the things a beginner needs. I love the camera!

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: GCPTV
Reviews.Content: Good camera, nice bundle, card reader is cheap but everything else is great in this bundle. I recommend this to anyone that wants a good starter DSLR. You will be amazed by the ease of use of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera- not the best add ons
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: I loved this set. The fact that it includes a camera and so many other awesome products for only 600 dollars is amazing. I've seen just the body of the T3i go for over 550 dollars and with the lens for over 600 so this is certainly a steal. So even though most of the other products suck, this is awesome. So below I've compiled a list of things I like and don't like:Pros:-Awesome price-Great packaging (I've been looking at reviews that say that the camera did not come in its original packaging but mine did)...-AMAZING CAMERA-Great lens- nice carrying bagCons:-some of the accessories suck-tripod is very cheap, it didn't break, but it does droop with some of my heavier lenses, making it hard to get a still angled shot.-camera didn't come with a memory chip (I don't know if this was just me but my camera didn't come with a memory chip so I had to resort to the extra one included with the 10 extra things you get.)Overall:I love the camera, lens, and carrying case, and even though everything else pretty much sucks, it still is great because other companies sell just the body and lens for over 600 so of course you should get this. But make sure not to depend on most of the products except the carrying bag and of course the camera. In the end though, all I had to do was buy another tripod (from dolica) and this worked fine, so I would recommend this product

Reviews.Title: Excellent out of the box experience!
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: I ordered this bundle and got it within 2 days. All items came  in their original box and was well packed together in a big brown ups box. I am New to DSLR cameras and i within 4 days of playing around, i have learned a lot! However the stock camera lens (18-55mm) is not great but it's not bad either so i advise you to shop around for a compatible lense.

Reviews.Title: Good product & Good service !
Reviews.Author: Zhen R
Reviews.Content: I love my Canon 600D which works perfect for a busy mom as me. Although it's an entry-level DSLR camera, it just meets all my needs. The seller is efficient who sent my product in a prompt way. They resent me a new memory card immediately after I complained that the camera was unable to access the card. Very good service!

Reviews.Title: Amazing bundle
Reviews.Author: Mauro
Reviews.Content: This has been, by far, one of the best items I've ever bought online. My daughter loves it - she's the family photographer, the pictures are amazing, and every extra item was of great quality.

Reviews.Title: Love the Camera, but.......
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Okray
Reviews.Content: This is one of the good news, bad news stories.  The bad news was the shipment arrived with a defective tripod and camera case.  The good news is that the company promptly replaced them.  I was disappointed in the tripod, one of the cheaper variety.  The package deal is still probably a good deal, but I would suggest pricing out the various components that you desire before purchasing the package deal..

Reviews.Title: grateful and accomplish purchase
Reviews.Author: Carlos Blanco
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera. Full hd video recording. I love it. I'm grateful with the seller for the efficiency about all his job

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digintal Camera
Reviews.Author: Lupe Gomez
Reviews.Content: This camera takes great photos and videos; works really well!  Price was excellent compared to others we had looked at.  I highly recommend it to parents who want photos to remember the special occasions with their children and with their families.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Peggy Howse
Reviews.Content: This camera had everything I was looking for.  The lens talks to the camera and most every shot is a winner.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase of my life
Reviews.Author: Kyle Elliott
Reviews.Content: This product is wonderful! Couldn't be more happier with my experience :D The bundle deal was great the only thing that didn't really work was the card reader but thats fine not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: T3i is great
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: The Canon T3i is a great camera to a budget photographer/videographer. Its affordable, but mainly because its very basic. No video autofocus, touch screen, candy dispenser, or any other additional stuff that companies try to shove at you. It shoots 1080p, has a great viewfinder, and has so far not let me down.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Ismael T.
Reviews.Content: The camera works great and the extra accessories are good for the price your getting the accessories for free pretty much

Reviews.Title: Well pleased!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Schneider
Reviews.Content: Whilst price shopping, I came across this bundle. Everywhere else I looked had the camera and lens kit for the exact same price as this bundle, so I thought "why not?" I have been well pleased with the lot.

Reviews.Title: Great package for a gift...
Reviews.Author: Pete Vz
Reviews.Content: I purchase this Canon camera package as a gift for a birthday.  I saw it had extra battery, SD card, carry case and a few more items.  For the price, it was great, cause separately you would pay extra in a retail store.  The camera is great with all the extras. If you a new camera with extras, I highly recommend picking up this package deal..

Reviews.Title: Great Camera - cheap bag
Reviews.Author: Puneet Bhasin
Reviews.Content: The Camera is great and the basic accessories are great.  However the bag this packag comes with is really cheaply made and is already starting to fall apart.

Reviews.Title: MISSING PIECE
Reviews.Author: Stephanie
Reviews.Content: I didn't receive the 16GB memory card with my camera. Disappointing as I didn't order others. Other than that everything came fine. I would like this to be sent to me.

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!
Reviews.Author: RONISVALDO RIBEIRO DOS SANTOS
Reviews.Content: Very good product as shown in the page for a very good price !! I recommend, and hope you enjoy like me !

Reviews.Title: Great for me
Reviews.Author: mel
Reviews.Content: I am so very glad this camera came with an instructional DVD. It really cleared up this whole shutter speed, white balance, exposure issue.  I am also so very glad that this camera can be put on fully automatic so I don't have to remember what all that stuff is. I haven't used the tripod yet, but everything else was great. We took this to Iceland and never ran out of battery or space. Highly recommend!!

Reviews.Title: T3i Eos Rebel Review
Reviews.Author: mack
Reviews.Content: Camera is an amazing start with photography I was very impressed with the quality. Very user friendly and the flip out screen is very nice to have.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Wait
Reviews.Author: Lindy Wright
Reviews.Content: I've wanted this camera for almost 10 years. I finally splurged and I love it. I'm a novice photographer and I know nothing about settings etc. This has been a great camera to learn on! I wish I would have spent the extra $100 and gotten the package with the extra 55-300 lens. I'm loving taking sports photographs but the zoom on the 18-55 lens is almost pointless. Having fun!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: KateMM
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera!!  The lenses it comes with are decent but you'll want to buy more.  The other accessories are great and it was just a great deal all around.  I've had this camera for ~6 months and NO complaints!  It's my first DSLR

Reviews.Title: photo bug
Reviews.Author: teresa hines
Reviews.Content: Was a present my son is delighted with it,used it right way ...would not trade.it ,wants more lenses.good buy for $

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: they seemed to enjoy it for a xmas present, everythig was there that they needed, so they didn't have to go looking for things

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Charles Ackley
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal and well worth the money. I would recommend this package to anyone looking for a great camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: Bought for girl friend for christmas she loves it and it takes nice photos. I would def buy this package again if i was a photo guy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Eakins
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 16yo daughter knowing it would grow with her. Shipping was super fast. Saw camera only at big box store for same $$$. Very happy

Reviews.Title: Daughter's Christmas Gift - 2013
Reviews.Author: L. Robidoux "Massage Therapist"
Reviews.Content: She about flipped out as she has wanted this camera "forever".  Her very first pictures were simply point-and-shoot -- and came out so good --- with such clarity and they looked professional.  She couldn't believe all the accessories that came with it.  She didn't have to go and buy a thing, as it was all included.

Reviews.Title: An excellent value for a first-time buyer!
Reviews.Author: Lee Lee
Reviews.Content: The included DVD is surprisingly helpful if you've never owned a DSLR camera before. It's definitely worth watching through at least once!

Reviews.Title: The camera is great; the 10 pc. bundle not so much
Reviews.Author: Miriam Pitz
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying the camera I got for Christmas.  I am glad to have the camera bag and the 16 Gb memory card that came with the bundle, but several of the bundled items are cheap.  The tripod will likely break before I have used it much.  It is very lightweight plastic, which is good for backpacking or hiking, but it is not sturdy.  The camera bag is not great, but it is nice to have a place to put all of the accessories.Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Carolina Oliveira
Reviews.Content: THE PRODUCT CAME AS EXPECTEDProduct New.Came all the items mentioned.Tripod low quality.Official canon box.Recommend.Excellent camera.

Reviews.Title: My son can't put it down
Reviews.Author: Joleen
Reviews.Content: Ever since,Christmas day my son has produced more photos.than I have collected in my whole lifeHe now has a job producing blogs.

Reviews.Title: CANON
Reviews.Author: DONALD MIDGETTE
Reviews.Content: WHAT CAN I SAY. CANON IS AT THE FOREFRONT OF THE DSLR VIDEO WORLD. IT IS THE SHAPE OF THINGS TO COME FOR INDEPENDENT FILM MAKERS WITH THIS START INTO THE PHOTO AND INDY FILM BIZ

Reviews.Title: A Great Deal
Reviews.Author: David Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: The excellent camera and all of the included accessories made this deal a great Christmas present for my photographer mother. It came well packaged and right on time for the big day, and will be used for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Excellent as Advertised!
Reviews.Author: Taimur
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality and legitimacy. Exactly sealed, original and as advertised. I was pleased by the service as well. Great product!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera - Good Deal
Reviews.Author: Eric T
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the price.  The camera is one of the best on the market at this price.  The accessories (namely the camera bag and the tripod) are a little on the flimsy side, but you are essentially getting them from free so no room to really complain.

Reviews.Title: Lack of card memory inthe kit
Reviews.Author: Marta H Gomez
Reviews.Content: I bought a 10 items kit with the camera. The card memory that was supposed to come in the kit did not came. I knew the lack of the card memory after openning  the camera/kit box a few days later. I did not make any claims because I am out of the US.

Reviews.Title: Great deal.
Reviews.Author: Justin Fernheimer
Reviews.Content: Great pricing with lots of extras. You can sometimes get the camera for around the same price, but the extra pieces sealed the deal.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for my duaghter for Christmas
Reviews.Author: JASON CENTRELLA
Reviews.Content: Product was easy to order and arrived  on time.  Ordered early Nov, and opened 12/25/13.  We bought the bundle as it was reasonably priced for the components included.  Everything was in the box and worked flawlessly. Tripod was a bit flimsy, but this is a workhorse camera, for a budding photographer.

Reviews.Title: Great Kit!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth William
Reviews.Content: It was awesome getting this whole kit with a single purchase. It has all of the stuff I would have bought separately. I did not compare the a la carte prices to this kit, because the price seemed reasonable for me and the convenience was a big factor in my thinking.The instructional DVD was very helpful and well done.As for the camera - excellent! You will not be disappointed!

Reviews.Title: HAs been great
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: This camera and the photo quality it takes has revolutionized my online selling. Great value for the money esp. in this kit.

Reviews.Title: Top Quality!!
Reviews.Author: franke
Reviews.Content: The whole transition and quality of product have been a very positive experience.I would strongly suggest this product for all !

Reviews.Title: Good and complete, as shown
Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my son, who is beginning his first steps filming, and he is completely mad about this camera. It is not the latest model, but has everything he needsf for a very reasonable price, and with all a basic kit (lenses, memory and tripod). So, it was a very good buying for us

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Roger Tigner
Reviews.Content: This is a complete kit for the price of what is normally the just the body. All the materials are top quality and there is everything you need to start with pictures the day it arrives.

Reviews.Title: Beauty and Beast
Reviews.Author: Alana "Alana"
Reviews.Content: I was a little scared to place my order since some people said they did not receive all the items as pictured, but Focus Camera sounded like an operation I could trust, so I took a chance. I am happy to report that everything came, exactly as pictured, well packaged, and 1 week earlier than I expected. The only semi-negative thing that I can say was a little disappointing is that the tripod is pretty low quality and seems too light for the camera, but I have another tripod so it's ok. The camera itself is a beauty and a beast. It is quality and it feels good in my hands. This is my first DSLR camera and even though I’m a total novice, it makes me feel like a pro. It is so sexy. Everything else isn’t the highest quality, but it is adequate and seems to have come with everything I needed to get started. Going to have my first photo session with my family in a couple of days. This was our Christmas present to ourselves and we’re all thrilled.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Sherry J Vogel
Reviews.Content: Bought this kit for my wife, and she loves it. We took it on vacation and took some really nice macro shots at the aquarium.

Reviews.Title: Awesome purch ase
Reviews.Author: Stacey
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy. The camera is awesome and after comparing prices, the extras were just that, free extras! The bag was the exact one shown, I also received the backup battery ( off brand, but still great) memory card, card reader, scratch protectors, cords, how_-to video, etc. The tripod is not super duty quality, but works great in doors. I received my order in a timely matter and I love it. Would buy all over again!

Reviews.Title: She loved the camera!!
Reviews.Author: Sue
Reviews.Content: Gave as a gift to our daughter- she loved all the accessories and how well organized everything was . Also complete with a great case to carry it all around in style.  She loved it!! Thanks!!

Reviews.Title: Get it! I wouldn't think twice.
Reviews.Author: PacmanSDR
Reviews.Content: The Camera itself is fantastic! I bought it just for that reason cheap for being a bundle deal. Camera and lens are just what you expect from canon great quality pictures and amazing video quality (but if your thinking of shooting video at night might want to buy a different lens) (Examples of videos on YouTube under "TheSDRChannel" look at most recents). As for the rest of the items...Wow, I thought I was going to get a bunch of low quality items but that's not the case. The memory card I got was sony and camera stand is great quality, same goes for the camera bad and back up battery. The video I haven't watch but I'm pretty sure that it give beginners good pointers. Highly reccomend this product if your on a budget or not and want a great camera.

Reviews.Title: love my canon
Reviews.Author: William Perry Belo
Reviews.Content: canon camera is the best camera ive ever owned.. Pictures are great it is a learning experience as it more camera than the last 3 .. but i bought the book...

Reviews.Title: Magnificent
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome! Crazy good quality of pictures, all the bells and whistles and simple to use. My first SLR

Reviews.Title: Nice Bundle
Reviews.Author: Brett Hutchison
Reviews.Content: Price still could have been better, lots of stuff we really dont need right off.  But a god deal for a Prime member, just starting out

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Stacy
Reviews.Content: Great purchase! By far a much better deal than buying just the camera at the local electronics store! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great Package!
Reviews.Author: Mary Brown "Mary"
Reviews.Content: I am not sure why others are complaining about the bundle. I am very happy with the camera bag for one. There is Plenty of room in it for everything (including two lenses) and it is very well made!  Sturdy and strong!  I am not a Professional though so this may be the reason. I think this is a great buy for everything you get. I just got it today and I ordered on Monday. It was here by Thursday. I will be back to give a review on the camera!

Reviews.Title: all you need
Reviews.Author: Jack El-Hajal
Reviews.Content: hi every thing that I need to start taking pictures and loving it very good package everyone will enjoy it like me

Reviews.Title: very nice!
Reviews.Author: Debbie Duvall
Reviews.Content: My husband is and has been thrilled with the new camera - takes really great photos that we can use to make our own postcards, etc.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: archidney51
Reviews.Content: This is for my daughter.  She likes her new camera though she has not really used it very much.  I would know more if she gives me feedback about it.

Reviews.Title: Best buy ever
Reviews.Author: Amateur@dslr
Reviews.Content: So super satisfied with this purchase... I wish I had bought it sooner than I did. It takes super amazing pictures with zero skill level!!!

Reviews.Title: Thumbs Up!
Reviews.Author: HStew
Reviews.Content: So excited to finally use my DSLR for some film products.Came with everything as advertised and within 4 days. Instantly gratifying :)

Reviews.Title: My first SLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Norris
Reviews.Content: More than I expected.Information on the maintance and use of camera and other helpful tips.Really enjoying using the different features.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Paulo H Nobre Belli
Reviews.Content: Of course the kit you get is not first quality because you're actually paying for the camera. But it's a great start!

Reviews.Title: I am in love with my camera worth the purchase price
Reviews.Author: andy
Reviews.Content: This package deal is a steal!First off in radioshack near me just the camera and Lens was $100 more than the bundle here.Secondly the camera is amazing, and the dvds included will make you a better photographer.I'm falling in love with my camera every time I use it and i'm still finding out even more features day by day.This is after a month of ownership.Would definitely recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: udaynarayansah
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my photography class.every where i look the price of this camera is pretty much same but hey don't have all accessories that i found here. it include every thing that i need for a beginner photographer.the accessories that i got with this camera arescreen Protector-2screen cleaner-1remote control-1memory card reader-1tripod-1DVD-1HDMI cable-1Battery -2Memory Card(16GB)-1Bag-1And Canon Accessories in the box(solution CD, battery, eye cap,etc.)i think it is a great price for camera and kits. if buy camera only on other store or online  it will cost between 530-599 without any kits.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!
Reviews.Author: Sabrina Garcia
Reviews.Content: The camera is amazing and all the accessories included in the kit are completely useful. Every single piece is worth it. I'm happy with it!

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: Mariel Lisel Muñoz Lopez
Reviews.Content: i love the bargain that the camera comes with all these accesories and they work great! definitely reccomend it :)

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Jaimi
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera!! I feel so professional and I have taken some great quality pictures and videos with this camera

Reviews.Title: Decent dslr
Reviews.Author: D-Rob "D-Rob"
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time, and was in perfect condition. The camera takes clear pictures, and the items in bundle were great addition so I didn't have to go around purchasing items myself. The stock lens personally is t that great. Yes it takes clear pics but zoom and focal length far under my expectations. Only problem I had was the freaking tripod broke when like when I took it out the box and tried to set it up. I contacted Amazon and told me to send everything back, I didn't want to being that it was just the tripod that was defective. But I did anyways and now have to wait for refund to purchase another bundle. The next one I will get will be the bundle with extra lens since stock lens blows chunks

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Migdalia Perez
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best gift I Got for myself. I like it so much very easy to useI would recommand it to anyone who love taking pictures..

Reviews.Title: Very good overall package
Reviews.Author: K. Meagher "MFT"
Reviews.Content: So I have only had this a week or so and took it out on a test run on the Sierra Nevada Mountains for the weekend. Very nice over all. All the accessories come in very handy, card reader, 16 gig card, nice useful case, basically everything you need to go up scale in one package. I will say the one negative is the tripod which I would trust on a back porch but this is a good, pro grade camera and check the tripod very carefully for breaks or weak spots. It is pretty flimsy. So far it is holding together though. There is a learning curve and a lot to learn but the manual does help. The e manual is much easier to learn from. I had a Nikon previously that ended up "swimming" in the South China Sea on my trip to the Philippines. I really missed that and was close to replacing with the same but that was an S8100, and though it was a great camera, this is definitely a big step up with the different lenses, etc. One inconvenience is that it is bigger than my previous camera which I could put in a large shirt or sweat shirt pocket. Hiking around with this Canon hanging around my neck takes some getting used to. For now, the pockets are for the camera on the cell phone. Bottom line is the quality of the pictures is totally worth a little bigger size and weight. I got some great shots over the weekend, lots of them! Oh one more thing, the movie mode is good too but it is not stereo sound. (my 8100 was) It does take great video with okay mono sound from the one mic in front. I definitely recommend this package for quality, price and fun.

Reviews.Title: video camera stopped working after a few months
Reviews.Author: Alexander Hernandez Ramirez
Reviews.Content: It takes great pictures but video has some tech difficulty. The accessories that it came with were ok but not great. Tripod broke after a few uses

Reviews.Title: ANAZING BUY!
Reviews.Author: Howard
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my camera! An amazing buy! Would do it again in a second! You won't regret it! I know I don't

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: sundar
Reviews.Content: I love this product. Will definitely recommend this product. Excellent packaging and delivered right on time with good and useful accessories. Is it possible to get a spare charger for a lower cost? i lost mine.

Reviews.Title: Rebel T3i
Reviews.Author: Barb Lucas
Reviews.Content: Not as easy as we thought it would be to learn how to use this camera.  Would be better for someone who is more tech savvy.  A little disappointed when I saw it later for a better price and with more hardware.

Reviews.Title: 5 Stars!
Reviews.Author: Jared "bigdaddy2004"
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about the deal because it seemed too good to be true. I received the package in a loosely put together amazon box but that was not a problem at all. When I opened the amazon box there was another box (well packaged) with everything it said it came with. Of course I cared most about the camera which was in its own Canon box. I was a little suspicious because that was not taped, however the camera seemed to be untouched. Everything was in great condition. THIS DEAL IS WORTH BUYING!!!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: M. Stark
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures and works well.  My husband seems to like it, so that is all that matters.  No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: lovetoread
Reviews.Content: LOVE the camera...takes great pics.  Bundle that came with this was good too.  Nice tripod and accessory bag.  Extra battery pack is a big PLUS.  Had trouble getting my invoice with the promo code for the 25 free prints but seller was able to help with that little snag.  All in all a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Far more capability than the average consumer will ever use
Reviews.Author: Skip Rohde
Reviews.Content: I bought the T3i after carefully comparing a number of similar cameras from Nikon and other manufacturers.  I've been totally happy with the camera and the rest of the package.  There are plenty of reviews of the camera itself, so I'll just comment on this entire bundle.  The lens is sharp and easy to use.  I would like to have more f-stop ranges, but that gets expensive no matter who makes the lens, and this one is a good balance of cost/performance.  The bag is excellent quality.  The tripod is a bit flimsy - I'll get a heavier-duty one eventually, but this one works fairly well.  The 16GB card works well for me - I download my photos after every session and clear the card, so I never come close to filling it up.  The DVD is a decent introduction to digital SLRs for newbies.  I recommend that you get a book dedicated to using the T3i.  The manual tells you what the buttons do, but it doesn't tell you why you would want to use them.  I bought the David Busch guide to T3i's and can recommend it as a great way to learn what this wonderful camera can do.

Reviews.Title: The camera is great.
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Love the camera. The tripod is very shaky and doesn't feel very stable at all. The bag is a good size and everything fits. Would be a 5 star if the tripod was better.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Webster
Reviews.Content: As advertised, best camera I have owned so far. It will take a little while to learn about all the settings etc, but WOW what photo's.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera, Decent Accessories.
Reviews.Author: B. Cassels "Rktboy"
Reviews.Content: The Canon T3i needs little praise.  You'll find reviews on this and every other site that will assure you it's a fine camera.  The accessories included in this kit are a decent bonus for little additional cost.  Look, if you want top quality, then go to a photography store, and hand pick these it's yourself.  But face it, you need a camera bag, a data card, and such right off the bat.  And the items included here, while perhaps not professional grade, certainly provide a cost-effective alternative for the beginning photographer.

Reviews.Title: excelente compra
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: Fue una gran compra, q gran camara con una excelente seleccion de lentes, una compra muy bien pensada y facil de manejar

Reviews.Title: Go and buy it from a store !!
Reviews.Author: Laila
Reviews.Content: I got Canon T3i in the end of 2011, the main reason I got it was to film videos. It doesn't film for more than 3-7 seconds. I tried to change the settings just to make it work but it didn'tMy friend has the same camera and it works just fine, I changed everything to the same as her's but it still doesn't work well. It only works in the worst quality. even my phone can film in a better quality than that.I'm so disappointed .. and the warranty has expired so I have to pay 204$ for an issue that I didn't make.

Reviews.Title: Awesome for backpacking.
Reviews.Author: Sierra Maclure
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice entry level camera that I take on my bkpk trips when I don't want to lug the 5D Mark II. 5D Mark II does better star shots.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This is an exceptional camera, and the deal for this whole kit was almost too good to pass up.  It was a gift for our daughter, and she has taken to it very easily.  Great photos, great options.  Highly recommended when the bundle price is right.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Terri Welborn
Reviews.Content: For us uninformed camera users, it works very well..with a little studying.We are enjoying this camera very very much...

Reviews.Title: Wonderful camera, I love it.
Reviews.Author: Tim T. Tompkins
Reviews.Content: The package arrived on time and with no issues.  The Canon EOS Rebel T3i is a wonderful camera, and a joy to use.  You can just snap, snap, snap all of the pictures you want, and then delete those that you don't like.  It has all the features and options that I was looking for.  I love this camera.

Reviews.Title: I love the Canon T3i DSLR Camera
Reviews.Author: Hildreth
Reviews.Content: I  am really happy about the quality of pictures I'm getting and so easy to use. It takes really good sports pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f
Reviews.Author: Sherrie Berg
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. The lens is awesome. It came on time and with everything it said it would.

Reviews.Title: i love it...excellent
Reviews.Author: pascual
Reviews.Content: really the product and price are excellent, delivery within the stipulated time and all accessories as indicated by the advertisement, I have not tested yet because it is a gift

Reviews.Title: Exceptional Camera, Camera bag cheap
Reviews.Author: farrah
Reviews.Content: The camera is phenomenal.  Although within two days of using the camera bag the buckles broke and it did not come with a shoulder strap. The rest of the accessories are great, but are definitely on the low to mid range of things. I am satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Canon T3i
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera , easy to operate. But I don't care for the stock lens,18-55mm and flash that came with it . I had to purchase a separate lens and external flash. Otherwise great camera !

Reviews.Title: Dream come true!
Reviews.Author: BSweet
Reviews.Content: I had recently taken over filming and editing announcements for my church services. The video cameras we had were $5000 HD Panasonic fancy things with P2 cards and the whole nine yards. Big Pain in the Rear for New Joe User!A friend showed me what he had done using his Canon T2i and I was blown away by the quality, cost & ease of use!After using the Canon now for a month, I've gotten raving reviews of our announcements and how they've never looked better!High quality film making at a cost you can't afford to pass up! Buy this bad boy! You won't be sorry!

Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Morgan A. Roberts
Reviews.Content: really great price in comparison to competitors. camera came just as described. and the extras were a nice touch. the tripod isn't the best, which is kind of obvious when you buy bundle kits that some things it's ok to lack quality because technology is pretty easy to replace(memory cards, batteries etc) but things suffer as well. as with the tripod. all in all great camera kit for the price. thank goodness it came with a bag.

Reviews.Title: how lucky i am..
Reviews.Author: kdrkly
Reviews.Content: i am really felling luck..because i was not expecting the item such a big quality like this..anyhow i was shocked when it came..thank you for the fast shipping by the way..i advice everybody to buy from amazon..see you again..

Reviews.Title: A very good camera for begginer like me.
Reviews.Author: Guido
Reviews.Content: This camera have a very good quality and have a speed nice.It is smaller then others and it is good because when you are starting you don't want to carry so much weight.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift
Reviews.Author: mrwichser
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife.  She loves it!  Arrived on time just as described.  Would purchase again in the future.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: babygirl
Reviews.Content: I just started taking photos and love it ... it makes it easy or can make it so you can learn how to use all the options like a pro!!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: D. Zabka "Zdflyboy9"
Reviews.Content: This is our first DSLR, so I don't have much to compare it to. The instruction manual is actually fairly easy to read for a first timer. I saw this camera in Best Buy last week for $850. Considering all of the extra stuff you get in this combo pack, you can't afford to pass it up!

Reviews.Title: excellente
Reviews.Author: Padilha
Reviews.Content: the camera is very good, the product came as I asked, I'm so happy, and I intend to do others shop

Reviews.Title: Camera is excellent bundle is utter trash.
Reviews.Author: Rory
Reviews.Content: I received this bundle today.  The camera so far seems to be very good and i have no issues with the camera itself.  I am rating this BUNDLE 1 star because the items within are very cheaply made and i received a few of them already opened/damaged.  I believe these items are used and they just stuffed them in the bundle to charge more money.  Very unhappy with this purchase.  i will look elsewhere when purchasing expensive electronic bundles in the future.

Reviews.Title: I am now my own Photographer
Reviews.Author: M. Norton
Reviews.Content: Love it.You can do SOOO much with this, or keep it simple and just put it on automatic and become a photographer.The stand is nice, the bag, the memory card, the extra batter, the lens is a must, just a good deal all around.

Reviews.Title: camara and stuff
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: everything was ok. Im happy with the products i ordered. It is all that I expected from amazon and the product itself.

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: akmanni
Reviews.Content: The whole package was a good buy; my brother loves his camera and the cleaning supplies help him to keep his camera new at all times.

Reviews.Title: good bundle
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Good camera the picture is not tha same that is shipped. Good parts all funcionally and in perfect condition+++++ and i am confort with this

Reviews.Title: Great Deal from great provider
Reviews.Author: Fathi Anayah "Fathi"
Reviews.Content: I love that set which includes the best user-friendly DSLR camera available in the market.  The bundle looks great and there is an extra battery which is an advantage when you have a special occasion. It is worth the money you pay for the camera bundle.The great thing about this set is the customer service of ZeeMo provider who delicately cares about its clients and their feedback. Once you have purchased something from ZeeMo, you will never feel deceived and they are doing a great job to keep you happy, not only satisfied.I recommend everyone to purchase this bundle. Many thanks ZeeMo and Amazon!

Reviews.Title: i have order Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm... and merory card was not found in my packet
Reviews.Author: rushi
Reviews.Content: wher is my memory card whatever you mention on package that not proper this is not fair with mi i have order so manny thing around more  $1600 i order last 6 mounth laptop camera moblle too many item my laptop is also faulty. last time my order was canceled before my knowledgeCanon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 10pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit (Electronics)The package arrived on Dec. 19, 2012 as promised. The camera is a fine piece, but I can't enjoy it since no SD card is enclosed in the package.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera
Reviews.Author: Ron Steele
Reviews.Content: Loved the camera, Got it for ex and she got it stolen, Drugs kids are not good for you they invite wrong people and you end up throwing money away.

Reviews.Title: transaction review
Reviews.Author: Bill Kammerer
Reviews.Content: This deal was handled in a professional and timely manner. It was a pleasure working with this seller and I am sure I will again in the future.Bill Kammerer

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera and DIGIC 4 Imaging - Body (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens - Focus USB Memory Card Reader
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Focus Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Focus Universal Memory Card Wallet - Focus Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Focus Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Focus Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 10pc Bundle 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
